#include<algorithm>
#include<iostream>
#include<cstdio>
#include<vector>
#include<fstream>
#include<iomanip>
#include<bitset>
#include<deque>
#include<queue>
#include<string>
#include<map>
#include<cstring>
#include<sstream>
#include<cmath>
#include<ctime>
using namespace std;

int min(int a, int b)
{
	if (a <= b)
		return a;
	else
		return b;
}

int main()
{
	int T;
	scanf("%d", &T);
	int S, M, W, C;
	for (int t = 0; t < T; t++)
	{
		scanf("%d %d %d %d", &S, &M, &W, &C);
		C = min(C, min(M*12, min((M+W)*4, (4*S)/5)));
		S -= C;
		W = min(W, min(M*2, (2*S)/3));
		S -= W;
		M = min(M, S);
		printf("%d %d %d\n", M, W, C);
	}
	return 0; 
}
